Blueoil

Document

catch phrase

An open source deep learning platform for low bit computation

Get Started

Key feature

  • 1

    Lightweight: weight is quantized to just 1 or 2 bit, activation is also.

  • 2

    Run on small FPGA: faster than CPU, less hot than GPU.

  • 3

    Battery included: All things including FPGA friendly network architecture are already prepared.

What is Blue oil?

BlueOil is a software stack dedicated to neural networks, including a special training method to perform quantization and original network architecture definition highly compatible with FPGAs in order to operate a neural network at high speed on a small FPGA So, if you prepare even data, you can easily do learning.
The learned model can be converted into binary that operates on the FPGA or CPU with one command, so it is easy to confirm the operation.
